name: DECAY
description: DECAY has a similar meta structure to REDUCED, in that the word DECAY literally decays each line we go down, until DECAY has fully decayed. We go from DECAY to DCAY to DKY to DK and each line down it still keeps the phonetical integrity of the word DECAY. I'm sure I'm not the first one to figure out any of what I've presented in this epic book, but to me these are the kinds of discoveries that yield so much truth. It's raw. It's factual. It's self-referencing. It's self-defining. It's everything and I love it.
